title: Salt 'n' chilli chicken wings and chow mein noodles
ingredients: ['Chicken wings', '12 chicken wings, tips removed', '190g plain flour', '1 tablespoon curry powder, or to taste', '1 teaspoon Chinese 5 spice powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 clove garlic, finely sliced', '1 red chilli, finely sliced', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', 'Noodles', '1 large onion, sliced', '1 large handful beansprouts', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 bag plain noodles (not the express variety)', 'splash water', 'Noodle dressing', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 pinch Chinese 5 spice powder', '2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', '1 teaspoon cornflour, mixed with a little water to form a paste', 'groundnut or vegetable oil for deep frying']
